message: Wonder who the first startup is ...

but thanks for joining the other group :P
we actually changed the url for the other one to just "/launch" to make it simpler
@andrewacove I think we're going to build it out to be a bit different, but not much

@leah is there a DM?  /related is there a convore feature/bug/suggestion group?
created by calacanis himself... so yeah'

it's an interesting problem though - sometimes you want to merge (e.g., two groups related to Launch that benefit from more contributors) . . . sometimes you don't because two related-but-separate groups have different flow/culture

nice.  using admin powers for good.
